1.0.name: wordpress/plus1-button
1.0.description:
Stable: 1

Nice shortcode for Google +1 dead simple to use [plus1 count="true" size="standard"] Size Examples: Tall [plus1 count="true" size="tall" ] medium: [plus1 count="true" size="medium"] Small: [plus1 count="true" size="small"] You can also set the url to the +1 by wrapping the short code around a url [plus1 count="true" size="small"]http://exmaple.com[/plus1]

See it in live here: http://gfxcomplex.com/wordpress_plugin/google-1-easy-button-wordpress-plugin/ GFX Complex You should follow me on G+
